## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.SET\_TINT\_COLOR" property

Emitted when the tint color of the entity is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.SET_TINT_COLOR]: {
        entity: Entity;
        tintColor: RgbColor | undefined;
    };
```
